review: I love the fire stick.  You simply plug it in to the TV, plug in the power and you're up and running.  They connect it to your amazon account when it ships so you don't even have to login.  Setup was easy and once connected to the wifi I was browsing amazon prime, netflix, and pandora.  This thing is great and my family and I watch it every day.
